EmfEngine Commercial

2.0.2

EmfEngine enables Qt based applications to easily export graphics to the Enhanced Metafile format which is the native vector graphics file format on Windows.

License
The Commercial Licence of EmfEngine is the appropriate license to use for the development of proprietary and/or commercial software.
This license is for developers who do not want to share the source code with others or otherwise comply with the terms of the GNU GPL version 3.0.
Platforms
The commercial version of EmfEngine can only be used on Windows platforms.
Dependencies
The commercial version of EmfEngine depends on the GDI+ library.
Downloads
EmfEngineCommercial-2.0.2.zip
Build options
Have a look at the configuration file config.pri. It is prepared for building a static, release version of the library.
Also please read the README.txt file.
Contact
Please don't hesitate to contact us for any questions related to pricing/licensing.
